title: House for sale in Hikkaduwa
details:
A house with three bed rooms, a living room, bathroom, large veranda, a pantry, parking space and a servant toilet.

Five minutes walk to the Galle-Colombo main road, Bus stand, Railway station and the market
Quite and safety surrounding, tilled house, good ventilation room and beautiful garden with bird watching.

Contact Tel: (+94) 713244653

Thanks for looking :)
